description:
Dugtrio is a large and faster evolution of Diglett. Dugtrio consists of three Diglett together. Dugtrio can be found in the wild in Diglett`s Cave and can be obtained when a Diglett grows to level 26.
Like its pre-evolved form Diglett, Dugtrio`s feet have never been seen. People have only seen a Dugtrio`s head(s).
name: Dugtrio
